IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: NED HAS A SINGULAR MISSION - ADVANCING DEMOCRACY IN SUPPORT OF FREEDOM AROUND THE WORLD. OUR TARGETED, DEMAND-DRIVEN SMALL GRANTS PROGRAM RESPONDS TO THE NEEDS OF LOCAL NGOS THAT DEFEND HUMAN RIGHTS, STRENGTHEN INDEPENDENT MEDIA AND CIVIC EDUCATION, AND EMPOWER WOMEN AND YOUTH IN A MANNER THAT ENABLES THEM TO ESTABLISH CREDIBILITY AS DEMOCRATIZING FORCES IN THEIR OWN SOCIETIES. NED FURTHER LEVERAGES ITS GRANTS PROGRAM THROUGH NETWORKING AND RECOGNITION ACTIVITIES THAT PROVIDE POLITICAL SUPPORT AND SOLIDARITY (THE WORLD MOVEMENT FOR DEMOCRACY, THE CENTER FOR INTERNATIONAL MEDIA ASSISTANCE, THE REAGAN-FASCELL DEMOCRACY FELLOWS PROGRAM, AND DEMOCRACY AWARD EVENTS), AS WELL AS THROUGH SCHOLARLY RESEARCH THAT GIVES ACTIVISTS ACCESS TO THE LATEST INSIGHTS ON STRENGTHENING DEMOCRATIC VALUES AND DEVELOPING STRATEGIES FOR DEMOCRATIC TRANSITION (THE JOURNAL OF DEMOCRACY AND THE INTERNATIONAL FORUM FOR DEMOCRATIC STUDIES).
IRS990.MissionDesc: NED HAS A SINGULAR MISSION - ADVANCING DEMOCRACY IN SUPPORT OF FREEDOM AROUND THE WORLD. OUR TARGETED, DEMAND-DRIVEN SMALL GRANTS PROGRAM RESPONDS TO THE NEEDS OF LOCAL NGOS THAT DEFEND HUMAN RIGHTS, STRENGTHEN INDEPENDENT MEDIA AND CIVIC EDUCATION, AND EMPOWER WOMEN AND YOUTH IN A MANNER THAT ENABLES THEM TO ESTABLISH CREDIBILITY AS DEMOCRATIZING FORCES IN THEIR OWN SOCIETIES. NED'S STATEMENT OF PRINCIPLES AND OBJECTIVES (1984): DEMOCRACY INVOLVES THE RIGHT OF THE PEOPLE FREELY TO DETERMINE THEIR OWN DESTINY. THE EXERCISE OF THIS RIGHT REQUIRES A SYSTEM THAT GUARANTEES FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION, BELIEF AND ASSOCIATION, FREE AND COMPETITIVE ELECTIONS, RESPECT FOR THE INALIENABLE RIGHTS OF INDIVIDUALS AND MINORITIES, FREE COMMUNICATIONS MEDIA, AND THE RULE OF LAW.
IRS990.Desc: EDUCATION, CULTURE, COMMUNICATION, AND FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION - THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS PROGRAMS THAT NOURISH A STRONG DEMOCRATIC CIVIC CULTURE. SUPPORT IS PROVIDED FOR CIVIC EDUCATION, TRAINING PROGRAMS, PUBLICATIONS AND OTHER COMMUNICATION MEDIA.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PLURALISM - THE ENDOWMENT ENCOURAGES THE DEVELOPMENT OF STRONG INDEPENDENT PRIVATE SECTOR INSTITUTIONS SUCH AS TRADE UNIONS, BUSINESS ASSOCIATIONS, CIVIC AND WOMEN'S ORGANIZATIONS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: DEMOCRATIC GOVERNANCE AND POLITICAL PARTIES - THE ENDOWMENT SEEKS TO PROMOTE STRONG STABLE POLITICAL PARTIES COMMITTED TO THE DEMOCRATIC PROCESS.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: THE HON ANDREW H CARD JR

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT IS GENERALLY EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. IN ADDITION, THE ENDOWMENT QUALIFIES FOR CHARITABLE CONTRIBUTIONS DEDUCTIONS AND HAS BEEN CLASSIFIED AS AN ORGANIZATION THAT IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. INCOME WHICH IS NOT RELATED TO EXEMPT PURPOSES, LESS APPLICABLE DEDUCTIONS, IS SUBJECT TO FEDERAL AND STATE CORPORATE INCOME TAXES. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE ENDOWMENTS TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT THE ENDOWMENT HAS TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO COMPLY WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THE ACCOUNTING STANDARD ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES, WHICH ADDRESSES THE DETERMINATION OF WHETHER TAX BENEFITS CLAIMED OR EXPECTED TO BE CLAIMED ON A TAX RETURN SHOULD BE RECORDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ENDOWMENT FILES TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTIONS. GENERALLY, THE ENDOWMENT IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL OR STATE AND LOCAL INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS BEFORE 2017.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE NATIONAL ENDOWMENT FOR DEMOCRACY MAINTAINS A COMPLIANCE DEPARTMENT WHOSE MISSION IS TO PROMOTE THE ACCOUNTABILITY OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS PROVIDED TO GRANTEES BOTH IN THE U.S. AND AROUND THE WORLD. THE COMPLIANCE DEPARTMENT IMPLEMENTS AN AUDIT STRATEGY THAT BEGINS WITH THE REQUIRED COMPLETION AND SUBMISSION BY GRANTEES OF A COMPREHENSIVE FINANCIAL QUESTIONNAIRE, WHICH IS USED BY THE COMPLIANCE DEPARTMENT, IN PART, TO DEVELOP RISK ASSESSMENTS AND THEN TO FORMULATE SPECIFIC AUDIT MONITORING PROCEDURES FOR INDIVIDUAL GRANTEES. AUDIT MONITORING PROCEDURES INCLUDE INVOICE VERIFICATION REVIEWS, DAILY TRANSACTION LEDGER REVIEWS, DESK REVIEWS, MAINTAINING AUDIT LOGS, REVIEW OF FEDERAL SINGLE AUDIT COMPLIANCE AND OTHER GRANTEE AUDIT REPORTS, CONDUCTING ON-SITE FINANCIAL REVIEWS, AND ENGAGING INDEPENDENT PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS TO PERFORM AUDIT PROCEDURES FOR CERTAIN GRANTEES. APPROPRIATE FOLLOW-UP PROCEDURES, INCLUDING REVIEW OF CORRECTIVE ACTION PLANS, ARE PERFORMED AS PART OF THE OVERALL AUDIT STRATEGY.
THE ORGANIZATION USES GAAP TO REPORT EXPENDITURES IN A FOREIGN REGION.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS FILED FORM 5713 UNDER SEPARATE COVER TO THE IRS. THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT REQUIRED TO FILE FORM 990-T.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE NATIONAL ENDOWMENT FOR DEMOCRACY MAINTAINS A COMPLIANCE DEPARTMENT WHOSE MISSION IS TO PROMOTE THE ACCOUNTABILITY OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS PROVIDED TO GRANTEES BOTH IN THE U.S. AND AROUND THE WORLD. THE COMPLIANCE DEPARTMENT IMPLEMENTS AN AUDIT STRATEGY THAT BEGINS WITH THE REQUIRED COMPLETION AND SUBMISSION BY GRANTEES OF A COMPREHENSIVE FINANCIAL QUESTIONNAIRE, WHICH IS USED BY THE COMPLIANCE DEPARTMENT, IN PART, TO DEVELOP RISK ASSESSMENTS AND THEN TO FORMULATE SPECIFIC AUDIT MONITORING PROCEDURES FOR INDIVIDUAL GRANTEES. AUDIT MONITORING PROCEDURES INCLUDE INVOICE VERIFICATION REVIEWS, DAILY TRANSACTION LEDGER REVIEWS, DESK REVIEWS, MAINTAINING AUDIT LOGS, REVIEW OF FEDERAL SINGLE AUDIT COMPLIANCE AND OTHER GRANTEE AUDIT REPORTS, CONDUCTING ON-SITE FINANCIAL REVIEWS, AND ENGAGING INDEPENDENT PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS TO PERFORM AUDIT PROCEDURES FOR CERTAIN GRANTEES. APPROPRIATE FOLLOW-UP PROCEDURES, INCLUDING REVIEW OF CORRECTIVE ACTION PLANS, ARE PERFORMED AS PART OF THE OVERALL AUDIT STRATEGY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BUDGET, AUDIT & ADMINISTRATION COMMITTEE, THE PRESIDENT, THE CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER, AND THE SENIOR DIRECTOR OF FINANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECTORS AND INDIVIDUALS EMPLOYED ARE REQUIRED TO AFFIRM THEIR COMPLIANCE WITH THE NED'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY COMPLETING A CONFLICT OF INTEREST CERTIFICATION FORM WHEN FIRST JOINING THE BOARD OR FIRST EMPLOYED AND ON AN ANNUAL BASIS THEREAFTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL SALARIES FOR NED EMPLOYEES MUST BE COMMENSURATE WITH NED POLICY ESTABLISHED BY ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS. SALARIES AND PROCEDURES FOR SALARY ADJUSTMENTS ARE PRESENTED TO BUDGET AND AUDIT COMMITTEE AS PART OF THE ENDOWMENT'S ORGANIZATIONAL BUDGET REVIEW PROCESS ANNUALLY, AND THEN BUDGETS ARE RECOMMENDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR APPROVAL. SPECIFIC SALARY ADJUSTMENTS FOR INDIVIDUAL EMPLOYEES ARE RECOMMENDED BY THEIR IMMEDIATE SUPERVISORS BASED ON A CURRENT PERFORMANCE EVALUATION, AND DEPENDENT ON MERIT AND/OR NEW RESPONSIBILITIES. THESE ADJUSTMENTS ARE APPROVED BY THE ENDOWMENTS LEADERSHIP. THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO IS DETERMINED ANNUALLY BY THE BUDGET AND AUDIT COMMITTEE IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE SAME ORGANIZATIONAL PROCEDURES. THE ENDOWMENT USES THE SERVICES OF AN OUTSIDE CONSULTANT AND PUBLISHED COMPENSATION SURVEYS IN SETTING SALARIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT GENERALLY MAKE AVAILABLE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC BUT WILL MAKE SUCH INFORMATION AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST FOR THE SAME PERIOD OF DISCLOSURE AS SET FORTH IN INTERNAL REVENUE CODE SECTION 6104(D).

THE ANNUAL AUDIT IS PRESENTED BY THE AUDITORS TO THE BUDGET & AUDIT COMMITTEE TO DISCUSS THE RESULTS OF THE ANNUAL AUDIT AND ANY FINDINGS. THE BUDGET & AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND ACCEPTS THE ANNUAL AUDIT AND RECOMMENDS TO THE BOARD FOR THEIR APPROVAL.
